name: df-cxp
body: |- wceq(ccxp, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cc, cif(cif(nat1, nat0, wceq(cv(s1), nat0)), cfv(ce, co(cv(s1), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(s0), nat0))))
comment: Define the power function on complex numbers. Note that the value of this function when ` x = 0 ` and ` ( Re `` y ) <_ 0 , y =/= 0 ` should properly be undefined, but defining it by convention this way simplifies the domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Aug-2014.)
